item.description: We will continue with the Communist Manifesto (http://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/download/pdf/Manifesto.pdf) and the Critique of the Gotha Programme (http://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/download/Marx_Critque_of_the_Gotha_Programme.pdf). We are getting closes and closer to start with The Capital in case anyone is interested in reading it ahead.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask about the philosophy group from the staff.
item.name: Marx: Communist Manifesto, Critique of the Gotha Programme
